name: Gentle Sea Breeze
desc: A refreshing drink. Its vivid blue-to-white gradient is evocative of cresting waves caressed by the sea breeze. Having a sip of this while on a holiday is sure to fill your heart with ease.

value.text: Decreases all party members' climbing and sprinting Stamina consumption by 20% for 900s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).
